step_feedback.feedback: You performed the circular shoulder blade squeeze well in step 1.  Keep focusing on the gentle, controlled movement.
In step 2, try to maintain a smoother, more controlled circular motion. Remember to breathe deeply as you move.
Step 3 shows some inconsistency.  Focus on completing four full repetitions with consistent, controlled movements.

exercise_summary: You did a good job with the shoulder rolls exercise!  Remember to squeeze your shoulder blades together gently and smoothly, making a circular motion.  Focus on deep breaths to improve your range of motion and oxygen flow.
